Description:
Paring Knife: 3 1/2"-long blade; 4 3/4"-long handle; 3 oz.
  • Sandwich Knife: 6 3/4"-long blade; 5"-long handle; 5.25 oz.
  • Chef's Knife: 5 1/2"-long blade; 5"-long handle; 5 oz.
  • Carving Knife: 8 1/4"-long blade; 6"-long handle; 8.5 oz.
  • Vegetable Knife: 7 1/2"-long blade; 6"-long handle; 9 oz.
  • Bread Knife: 9"-long blade; 6"-long handle; 8.25 oz.
  • 14-slot Storage block: 12" x 5 1/2" x 12 3/4"high.
    • Use & Care

    Use

    • Always use caution when handling sharp objects.
    • Avoid cutting on hard surfaces such as stone, metal or glass.
    • It is not advisable to use any knife but a meat cleaver to cut through bone
    • or frozen food, as the blade can be easily damaged.

    Care

    • Hand-wash with warm water and a mild detergent. Rinse and dry immediately.
Name: Global Sai 7-Piece Knife Block Set | Williams Sonoma
